title: I Finally understand the Tribunal System
body:
Many players have been banned.. Ever since I got the 14 day suspension I made it my life goal to make others experience what I had to go through all this days.. So I did the same as those other trolls who purposely did certain things to bait you.. I manage to 14 day ban or possibly permanently banned other players accounts. This is your perfect system riot. This people that I got banned are most likely innocent players who got fked over by trolls. Now that same troll will play again and get others players banned abusing the same "Im a bad player and ACTING nice in chat while baiting a player to flame them when they are clearly inting on purpose to force someone to rage" I have done my research on youtube and google on how players get banned in the first place.. I notice that trolling is allowed. The system doesn't pick it up..

Trolling = Makes your team rage = Report team mate raging at you with toxic 99.9 percent of bans = You banned an innocent ally for your trolling. That's what happened to me. And you guys made fun of me.. Now look at other thats I successfully got banned. In my eyes they are innocent.. I just BAITED them out by using methods such as ping spamming and not playing at my optimal level and acting nice in chat while barely talking in chat at all.

Fix your System riot. Or else you might create more players like me.. I ain't the first. Pretty sure there is thousands of players doing this method.

Thanks for putting me down Forum players. Now I'm doing Riot games a favor by baiting bans. then you guys will blame the guy who got banned for being Toxic and letting the troll get away as usual.  So GFG.

replies.body: ... the tribunal system has been gone for a long time.

"I was an asshole, got banned, realized that I was utterly incapable of taking any semblance of responsibility for my own actions, and now continue to be an asshole. Discuss this with me."

Did I accurately sum up your thread? Because you're ridiculously long-winded, and I think you'll get more engagement if you're a bit more concise in the future.

You forgot the part that I now get players banned for things that I did on purpose to lower the chances of us winning the game. I never ever got anyone banned or did I ever had a need to report someone. But now since im serving a ban. I'll gladly punish others and possibly find forums in this game and get them banned as well. Feels like I'm talking a to a brick wall. I'm setting up bans for people who easily rage by me playing badly. Do you understand now..

In reality I'm extremely good at this game. Isn't that what you want in a team mate. Well guess what you lose it. Now you get another typical baiter troll.
Dude, nobody gives half a fuck about your manifesto. You're an immature troll, and they're a dime a dozen.
Thats right this does sound like a that guy

So, you are getting the people that rage easily out of the game so that I don't have to play with them?

I mean, thanks I guess? I mean, they would eventually be queued with someone worse than them and rage until they get banned anyway if they lose their temper like that so you probably aren't achieving anything notable.

Also, you should probably realize that if you play sub optimally your mmr will drop and eventually you will find yourself at a point where that is just how skilled everyone is, and doing bad on purpose will slowly take over your muscle memory making you actually worse at the game.

So, over the long term you are getting people banned who probably already need to be banned and making yourself worse at the game.

Not only that. I report players who are talking to their friends. And get them banned as well. It's so easy to abuse this system is not even funny.  And I'll never become bad. When I took the challenge of playing rank all I did was go up.. Still to this day I have never ever being unable to climb. So technically I can hit Diamond - Master - Challenger tier if I dedicate more time. I already played enough games to develop insane mechanics. In which most of you won't see because I'll play at a bronze V or Plastic level. To make sure people on this forums who are usually bronze and silver to rage even more. And hopefully get their accounts banned. I'm not breaking the rules.. Than again is hard to detect a troll.

I highly recommend you guys watch videos on how to do this stuff. You will get a huge laugh getting a message that you successfully fucked someone over. That 3 man duo probably had a blast suspending my account after inting and cursing at me. So I obviously curse at them back. But they ended up winning due to me not reporting them for everything they did to me. Awesome system right.  

I'm pretty much a Jensen type player. Minus the DDOS part. But I play solely to win and not play for fun as most of you people play this game for. I don't care if it's a normal game. I can tell when someone is bad, in which I would avoid toxic behavior. Unless I obviously know I'm getting trolled heavily and being cursed at by other players. 

The player that got banned reminded me so much of myself. His words were " I'm getting trolled by this Orianna (true)" I was infarct trolling and got his account banned when he couldn't take it anymore. I couldn't help but laugh at his misery that I had cause. We in the end suffer the same fate. He will probably become one of me. Until I eventually phase out and move on to destroying rank games. And fully committing myself to the ranking life like most pros.

The proper response to someone cursing at you is to mute them and report them at the end of the game. And again, if you can bait someone into raging at you then they would have done it eventually over someone who is simply a lower skill level than the person you are getting punished, meaning all you are doing is getting them punished a little sooner.
